CSSWhite-space.summary: The white-space CSS property sets how whitespace inside an element is handled.

blockquote.para: Note: To make words break within themselves, use overflow-wrap, word-break, or hyphens instead.

remarks.para: -Properties that define how words break within themselves: overflow-wrap, word-break, hyphens
